definition: abbr. for Ukraine 烏克蘭|乌克兰[Wu1 ke4 lan2]/surname Wu
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to go up in smoke/to vanish

sentences.english: A ministry official described the report as groundless.
sentences.chinese: 一位部级官员称这篇报道纯属子虚乌有。

sentences.english: Utopia, meanwhile, has gone on the warpath.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，同时乌有之乡则整装待发。

sentences.english: Don't go for wealth ; even that fades away.
sentences.chinese: 不要追求万贯家产，财富最终也会化为乌有。

sentences.english: Utopia, meanwhile, has gone on the warpath
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，乌有之乡已经准备战斗。

sentences.english: This is all humbug and good humor, of course.
sentences.chinese: 这些当然只是人们的幽默和子虚乌有。

sentences.english: Till love and fame to nothingness do sink.
sentences.chinese: 直到爱与虚名化为乌有沉寂无声。

sentences.english: I felt quite distressed at being untruthfully slandered.
sentences.chinese: 面对子虚乌有的诽谤我感到很苦恼。

sentences.english: Unlike Utopia, Liu speaks in measured tones.
sentences.chinese: 和乌有之乡不同，刘讲起话来小心谨慎。

sentences.english: Unless this is reversed, excess supply of surplus countries must also collapse.
sentences.chinese: 除非发生逆转，盈余国家的过度供给也必将化为乌有。

sentences.english: But my tangle of half-truths was all for naught.
sentences.chinese: 但我对半真半假纠纷是所有化为乌有。

sentences.english: Look into the problems and you will find they are fictitious.
sentences.chinese: 去看这些问题，你会发现它们子虚乌有。

sentences.english: He knew that his hope oozed away.
sentences.chinese: 他知道他的希望逐渐化为乌有了。

sentences.english: Unfavorable perception caused the company’s low-cost borrowing to evaporate almost immediately.
sentences.chinese: 不良信誉导致该公司的低成本贷款几乎即刻化为乌有。

sentences.english: All this eats into the potential of the economy to grow.
sentences.chinese: 所有这一切都把经济增长的潜力化为乌有。

sentences.english: When Beckham missed the penalty kick, his team's advantage went down the drain.
sentences.chinese: 贝克汉姆踢飞了点球，球队的优势随即化为乌有。

sentences.english: There is no such thing as the perfect parent. Or the perfect child, for that matter.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的完美父母，或者说完美子女，根本是子虚乌有。

definition: to go up in smoke/to vanish
to vanish like smoke in thin air/to disappear
to change into/to turn into/to become
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
to melt like ice and break like tiles/to disintegrate/to dissolve
to change into/to turn into/to become
